Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: src
Description: Interact with Sourcegraph from the command line

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show help for src

Arguments.Name: search
Arguments.Description: Run a code search

Arguments.Name: -display
Arguments.Description: Limit the number of results that are displayed. Only supported together with stream flag. Statistics continue to report all results

Arguments.Name: -dump-requests
Arguments.Description: Log GraphQL requests and responses to stdout

Arguments.Name: -explain-json
Arguments.Description: Explain the JSON output schema and exit

Arguments.Name: -get-curl
Arguments.Description: Print the curl command for executing this query and exit. (WARNING: Includes printing your access token!)

Arguments.Name: -insecure-skip-verify
Arguments.Description: Skip validation of TLD certificates against trusted chains

Arguments.Name: -json
Arguments.Description: Whether or not to output results as JSON

Arguments.Name: -less
Arguments.Description: Pipe output to `less -R` (only if stdout is terminal, and not json flag)

Arguments.Name: -stream
Arguments.Description: Consume results as stream. Streaming search only supports a subset of flags and parameters: trace, insecure-skip-verify, display, json

Arguments.Name: -trace
Arguments.Description: Log the trace ID for requests

Arguments.Name: -user-agent-telemetry
Arguments.Description: Include the operating system and architecture in the User-Agent sent with requests to Sourcegraph

Arguments.Name: api
Arguments.Description: Sourcegraph API Access

Arguments.Name: -get-curl
Arguments.Description: Print the curl command for executing this query and exit (WARNING: includes printing your access token!)

Arguments.Name: -dump-requests
Arguments.Description: Log GraphQL requests and responses to stdout

Arguments.Name: -insecure-skip-verify
Arguments.Description: Skip validation of TLS certificates against trusted chains

Arguments.Name: -query
Arguments.Description: GraphQL query to execute, e.g. ‘query { currentUser { username } }’ (stdin otherwise)

Arguments.Name: -trace
Arguments.Description: Log the trace ID for requests

Arguments.Name: -user-agent-telemetry
Arguments.Description: Include the operating system and architecture in the User-Agent sent with requests to Sourcegraph

Arguments.Name: -vars
Arguments.Description: GraphQL query variables to include as JSON string, e.g. ‘{“var”: “val”, “var2”: “val2”}’

Arguments.Description: 'src login' helps you authenticate 'src' to access a Sourcegraph instance with your user credentials
